item.title: Notes on rock painting copy no. 8: the rain and the rain-bull
item.summary: Remarks concerning copies of Bushman Paintings, given by Colonel Durnfold to His Excellency Sir Bartle Frere.–By |han≠kass'o. (L VIII.-22. 7969-7972, 7974 and 7975, 7983-7993, 23. 7995–8004). |han≠kass'o describes a copy of rock painting no. 8., in which there is a depiction of a rain-bull in the clouds.
item.comments: 1) p.7997v: |xam terms for the body parts of the rain, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-23
